variants.usage: All variant-able components must use cva() + VariantProps for type-safe variants.

animations.usage: Use tw-animate-css utility classes for non-essential motion; always respect motion-reduce.

brandIntent: Clean white surfaces + deep navy sections + cyan accents
Soft elevation, generous whitespace, subtle borders

layoutMotifs: Hero/feature sections with dark navy background + light text
Cards with rounded corners, light borders, subtle shadow
Section headings with clear hierarchy and short supporting copy

tokenApproach: Use your existing @theme tokens as the brand palette.
Create semantic CSS variables for UI roles (bg, surface, text, border, primary, focus, etc.).
Map semantics to brand tokens differently in light vs dark for contrast.

tailwindUsage.preferredPattern: Use utility classes that reference semantic vars via arbitrary values (e.g. bg-[var(--ui-surface)] text-[var(--ui-text)] border-[var(--ui-border)]).
avoid: Hardcoding hex values in component classes (except in the theme layer).
Using color-only state to convey meaning (always pair with icon/text).

reducedMotion.rule: Respect prefers-reduced-motion: reduce by removing non-essential animations.

rules: Only animate feedback/transitions (popover open/close, toast enter/exit, subtle refresh pulse).
Prefer opacity/translate/scale animations; avoid large motion.
Always provide motion-reduce fallbacks (motion-reduce:animate-none).

guidance: Icons are optional but if used must be decorative (aria-hidden=true) unless conveying unique meaning.
If icon conveys meaning, provide accessible name via adjacent text or aria-label.

globalRules: All interactive elements must be keyboard reachable and usable (Tab/Shift+Tab, Enter/Space, Esc where appropriate).
Use :focus-visible styles (not :focus) and never remove outlines without replacement.
Ensure minimum target size ~44x44px for touch where possible (IconButton included).
Do not rely on color alone for status; include text and/or icon.
Provide visible error text tied to inputs via aria-describedby; mark invalid via aria-invalid.
For async UI: announce status changes using aria-live regions (polite for updates, assertive for critical errors).
contrastGuidance: Text on light surfaces should meet 4.5:1 (normal) / 3:1 (large).
Text on brand-dark sections should be white/near-white; avoid brand-cyan as body text on white if contrast fails—use it for accents/borders/focus.

Dialog/Modal: role=dialog, aria-modal=true, label via aria-labelledby, description via aria-describedby
Trap focus; restore focus to trigger on close; Esc closes
Menu/Dropdown: role=menu with roving tabindex; arrow key navigation; Esc closes; Enter activates
Tabs: role=tablist/tab/tabpanel; arrow key navigation between tabs; selected state via aria-selected
Tooltip: Must appear on focus and hover; content referenced via aria-describedby; do not trap focus

stylingConventions.cnUtil: Use a cn() utility to merge Tailwind classes safely.

rules: Use cva() for class definitions and VariantProps<typeof variants> for prop typing.
Keep variant names consistent across components (size: sm|md|lg, intent/variant: primary|secondary|ghost|destructive|inverse).
Prefer compound variants over deeply nested conditionals.

stylingConventions.slots: Prefer composition via children and subcomponents for complex components (Card, Table, Dialog).

rules: Overlays (Modal/Dropdown/Popover/Tooltip) must include enter/exit animations using tw-animate-css classes.
Never animate layout in a way that impacts readability; keep durations short (150–250ms).

Container.intent: Page-width constraint + horizontal padding; centers content.

classes.base: mx-auto w-full max-w-6xl px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8

Inline.intent: Horizontal layout row with wrapping and spacing.

Card.intent: Primary surface container used throughout the site/app; supports header/body/footer regions.

Heading.intent: Consistent headings h1–h6 with brand typography.

Text.intent: Typography primitive for paragraphs/labels/muted text variants.

Button.intent: Primary action; supports variants, sizes, loading state, icons.

classes.base: inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 rounded-xl font-[var(--font-brand-secondary)] font-semibold disabled:opacity-50 disabled:pointer-events-none select-none

rules: When loading=true: set aria-busy=true; optionally aria-disabled=true; keep width stable; show Spinner with aria-hidden.
If icon-only usage: use IconButton instead.

IconButton.intent: Square icon action button with accessible label.

rules: aria-label is required.
Icon inside should be aria-hidden unless it conveys unique meaning.

Badge.intent: Small status/type label pill (asset type, status, etc.).

classes.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-full px-2.5 py-1 text-xs font-semibold border

tone.success: bg-emerald-50 text-emerald-800 border-emerald-200 dark:bg-emerald-500/15 dark:text-emerald-200 dark:border-emerald-500/25
tone.warning: bg-amber-50 text-amber-800 border-amber-200 dark:bg-amber-500/15 dark:text-amber-200 dark:border-amber-500/25
tone.danger: bg-red-50 text-red-800 border-red-200 dark:bg-red-500/15 dark:text-red-200 dark:border-red-500/25

notes: Badges are non-interactive by default. If clickable, use Chip.

Chip.intent: Selectable pill for toggles (e.g., time ranges).

classes.base: inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-full px-3 py-1.5 text-sm font-semibold border

rules: Render as <button type='button'> by default.
Expose pressed state via aria-pressed when used as toggle.

Input.intent: Text input with label/description/error handled by FormField wrapper.

classes.base: w-full rounded-xl border border-[var(--ui-border)] bg-[var(--ui-bg)] px-3 text-[var(--ui-text)] placeholder:text-[var(--ui-text-subtle)]

rules: id must be set and label must reference it (via FormLabel htmlFor).
When error: set aria-invalid=true and connect error text via aria-describedby.

Select.intent: Native select styled to match inputs (accessible and simple).
Select.implementation: Prefer <select> with custom chevron icon for reliability and accessibility.

classes.base: w-full h-10 rounded-xl border border-[var(--ui-border)] bg-[var(--ui-bg)] px-3 text-sm text-[var(--ui-text)]

rules: Use native select unless requirements demand searchable combobox.

Combobox.intent: Searchable select for symbols; async suggestions; debounced input.

rules: Follow ARIA combobox pattern: role=combobox, aria-expanded, aria-controls, aria-activedescendant.
Suggestions list: role=listbox; items role=option; selected state via aria-selected.
Announce loading and 'no results' via aria-live polite region.

visual.panel: rounded-xl border border-[var(--ui-border)] bg-[var(--ui-bg)] shadow-md shadow-black/10 overflow-hidden

Tabs.intent: Accessible tabs; can also be used as pill category switcher similar to screenshot.

classes.tabList: inline-flex rounded-full bg-[var(--ui-surface)] p-1 border border-[var(--ui-border)]
classes.tab: rounded-full px-4 py-2 text-sm font-semibold text-[var(--ui-text-muted)] hover:text-[var(--ui-text)] focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-[var(--ui-focus)]
classes.tabActive: bg-[var(--ui-bg)] text-[var(--ui-text)] shadow-sm shadow-black/5 border border-[var(--ui-border)]

rules: Use roving tabindex among tabs.
Arrow keys move focus; Enter/Space activates.
tabpanel has aria-labelledby to active tab.

classes.content: min-w-48 rounded-xl border border-[var(--ui-border)] bg-[var(--ui-bg)] shadow-md shadow-black/10 p-1
classes.item: w-full text-left px-3 py-2 text-sm rounded-lg hover:bg-[var(--ui-surface)] focus:bg-[var(--ui-surface)] outline-none

rules: Menu opens on Enter/Space/ArrowDown.
Arrow keys navigate; typeahead optional; Esc closes.
Return focus to trigger on close.

Modal.intent: Accessible modal dialog for confirmations and forms.

classes.content: fixed left-1/2 top-1/2 w-[min(92vw,560px)] -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 rounded-2xl border border-[var(--ui-border)] bg-[var(--ui-bg)] shadow-lg shadow-black/20 p-6
classes.title: text-xl font-semibold font-[var(--font-brand)] text-[var(--ui-text)]

rules: Trap focus inside; restore focus on close.
Esc closes unless explicitly disabled for critical flows.
aria-labelledby and aria-describedby are required.

classes.content: rounded-lg bg-[var(--ui-inverse-bg)] text-[var(--ui-inverse-text)] text-xs px-2 py-1 shadow-md shadow-black/20

rules: Must appear on focus as well as hover.
Do not contain interactive content.

Table.intent: Responsive table with sticky header option; executive-friendly readability.

classes.wrapper: w-full overflow-x-auto rounded-2xl border border-[var(--ui-border)] bg-[var(--ui-bg)]
classes.th: text-left text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-wide text-[var(--ui-text-muted)] px-4 py-3 border-b border-[var(--ui-border)]
classes.td: px-4 py-3 text-sm text-[var(--ui-text)] border-b border-[var(--ui-border)]

rules: Use <th scope='col'> for headers.
Sortable headers must be buttons with aria-sort.

Stat.intent: Metric display (label + value + delta) for dashboards/overview cards.

DeltaPill.intent: Positive/negative delta indicator with arrow + color + text.

classes.base: inline-flex items-center gap-1 rounded-full px-2 py-1 text-xs font-semibold border
classes.success: bg-emerald-50 text-emerald-800 border-emerald-200 dark:bg-emerald-500/15 dark:text-emerald-200 dark:border-emerald-500/25
classes.danger: bg-red-50 text-red-800 border-red-200 dark:bg-red-500/15 dark:text-red-200 dark:border-red-500/25

rules: Include text like '+2.4%' or '-1.1%'—do not convey meaning via arrow/color only.
Mark parent region aria-busy=true while loading.
Skeleton itself aria-hidden=true.

tone.success: bg-emerald-50 border-emerald-200 text-emerald-900 dark:bg-emerald-500/10 dark:border-emerald-500/25 dark:text-emerald-100
tone.warning: bg-amber-50 border-amber-200 text-amber-900 dark:bg-amber-500/10 dark:border-amber-500/25 dark:text-amber-100
tone.danger: bg-red-50 border-red-200 text-red-900 dark:bg-red-500/10 dark:border-red-500/25 dark:text-red-100

rules: Use role='status' for info/success; role='alert' for danger when immediate attention required.

howToApplyThisSpec: For each component in your inventory JSON, map it into one of: primitives, controls, navigationAndOverlays, dataDisplay, feedback, layout.
Use the Foundations (semantic vars + typography + radii + focus ring) as the non-negotiable baseline.
Prefer fewer visual variants; rely on tone + elevation + spacing to express hierarchy.
highPriorityExecutivePolish: AppShell / Page / SectionHeader: consistent spacing, breadcrumbs area optional, right-side actions align
Cards and Tables: crisp borders, soft shadows, strong typography hierarchy
Buttons/Chips/Tabs: pill-forward, subtle hover, strong focus
Error/Empty states: calm language, single primary CTA, do not look 'developer-ish'

requiredCrossCuttingBehaviors.lightDark: Every component must use semantic vars for bg/text/border; do not hardcode light-only grays.
requiredCrossCuttingBehaviors.a11y: Every component must document ARIA + keyboard behavior in code comments and tests.
requiredCrossCuttingBehaviors.density: Default to comfortable spacing; add compact options only where data density demands it (Table).

deliverables: Tailwind semantic variable usage throughout components
Keyboard + aria behaviors for all overlays and composite widgets
Dark mode verified visually (no low-contrast text)
Example usage snippets per component (Storybook or simple demo pages if allowed)
definitionOfDone: No component uses raw hex colors except theme layer
All interactive elements have focus-visible ring
Forms show label + hint + error patterns consistently
All overlays trap focus and restore it on close
Contrast passes WCAG AA for standard text
